stories.text:
SURVEY LINK: https://hbs.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_0uNhAw2MyBhIY2q

Asking for help from startup founders! As a startup founder, you spend a considerable amount of time making decisions about how to best run your business including where to locate your headquarters. We – a team from Harvard Business School and UC Berkeley Haas - are conducting a study to better understand how startup’s location decisions are made. We would especially like to know what types of environments are the most beneficial for nascent firms and how you as a founder interact with others in your work neighborhood. To shed light on this, we - and future founders - need your help! We would really appreciate you taking the time to complete our survey. It will take around 5 minutes (or less) to answer all the questions. Thank you!

Prof. Maria Roche and Sahiba Chopra
stories.title: Quick survey for startup founders from research team at Harvard and Berkeley
